column5: I am usually fish Simcoe for perch/whitefish/trout. Looking to catch some Crappies. Does anyone know an hut operator who can put me on fish, within 2hr drive from Toronto.  Thanks in advance.  Jiggy
I dunno if its within 2 hrs but look up Jack Lake Lodge. Great crappie fishing and excellent hut services. Not to mention , very good prices. I think it was $25/ person when we went a few years ago.
http://www.jackslakelodge.com/  Thanks. The website says 2hr from Toronto. 204km according to Google Maps. That actually may work.  Jiggy
There was no ice info on heir site. Do I just call them. I am interested too Landry
Found this link when i did a quick search. http://www.jackslakelodge.com/Crappie.htm
http://www.stilesfishhuts.com/  pretty good crappie fishing when it gets dark
BJ's Bait and Tackle rents huts on rice lake, and they get crappies out of them at night. I've never tried it myself, but they do get them.  S.
Looks good...I have to remember this lake....THANKS.
